changeSet.createView: select ost.ID ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_ID, ost.NAME ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_NAME, os.ID ORDER_SUBJECT_ID, os.NAME ORDER_SUBJECT_NAME, ci.ID CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ID, ci.ITEM CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ITEM, osc.IS_PARENT IS_PARENT from ORDER_SUBJECTS os inner join ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES ost on ost.ID = os.ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_ID left join ORDER_SUBJECT_CONSUMABLES osc on os.id = osc.ORDER_SUBJECT_ID left join CONSUMABLE_ITEMS ci on ci.id = osc.CONSUMABLE_ITEM_ID where ci.id IS NOT NULL union select ost.ID ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_ID, ost.NAME ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_NAME, os.ID ORDER_SUBJECT_ID, os.NAME ORDER_SUBJECT_NAME, ci.ID CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ID, ci.ITEM CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ITEM, ostc.IS_PARENT IS_PARENT from ORDER_SUBJECTS os inner join ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES ost on ost.ID = os.ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_ID left join ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES_CONSUMABLES ostc on ost.ID = ostc.ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_ID left join CONSUMABLE_ITEMS ci on ci.ID = ostc.CONSUMABLE_ITEM_ID where ci.id IS NOT NULL
